title: transfer account
body: well i transfered my account to eu west but i didnt think the delay was going to be as big as it was so i went and bought a $25 wrp card to switch back to oce but it wouldnt work cause i didnt know u can use au for euwest anyways i dont have a credit card anmore and i cant use paypal what can i do to get my account back can riot transfer it and i just buy a rp card and they take 2600 rp out of it or idk somone help :'({{summoner:10}}

replies.body:
**Your lack of punctuation, grammar, spelling, capital letters and formatting rustles my jimmies on a level deeper than that of any supermarket product.**

But aside from that,

You need to buy RP from the country that your account is connected to via the server, ie. if you're account is on OCE, then you need to buy RP from Australian or New Zealand vendors, if you're account is on NA, then you need to buy RP from American vendors.

This is strange, though, because you're claiming to have brought the RP from the EUW account itself using the online store; that should eliminate any region issues you might encounter. Did you by any chance buy the RP using a different account?

And how can you not have a credit card anymore? Did it get cancelled?
